# Controller G-Code Programming

> **Skill ID:** `prism-controller-gcode`
> **Category:** CONTROLLER
> **Version:** 2.0.0

## Description

Standard G-code commands

## Capabilities

- Handle g-code programming for all controller families

## Usage

This skill provides expertise in controller g-code programming.

### When to Use

- When working with controller
- When needing controller g-code programming capabilities

## Dependencies

- `prism-gcode-reference`

## Hooks
